Text: ENJOY!! I couldn't find this movie anywhere so I thought I'd share after I actually got it.

Ah, didn't work. Just downloaded a huge amount of fragmented files. Not sure how you would put this right. Pity.
@ swallowswing: You should have two folders audio_ts and video_ts, if you have VLC you can right click on the video_ts folder and select play with VLC. It should play like a DVD.
